anya-e0803n12:3_0: Yāni honti tiliṅgāni, anukūlāni yāni ca;
anya-e0803n12:7_0: Tesu kānici rūpehi, sesāññehi ca yujjare;
anya-e0803n12:8_0: Kānici pana saheva, etesaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ idaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:9_0: Etasmā lakkhaṇā muttaṁ, na padaṁ sabbanāmikaṁ;
anya-e0803n12:11_0: Sabbanāmāni nāma – sabba katara katama ubhaya itaraañña aññatara aññatama pubba para apara dakkhiṇa uttara adharayata eta ima amukiṁ eka ubha dviti catu tumha amha iccetāni sattavīsa.
anya-e0803n12:12_0: Etesu sabbasaddo sakalattho, so ca sabbasabbādivasena ñeyyo.
anya-e0803n12:12_6: Tathā hi pubbaparā para dakkhiṇuttarasaddā pulliṅgatte yathārahaṁ kāladesādivacanā, itthiliṅgatte disādivacanā, napuṁsakaliṅgatte ṭhānādivacanā.
anya-e0803n12:12_7: Adharasaddopi heṭṭhimatthavācako vavatthāvacanoyeva, so ca tiliṅgo ‘‘adharo patto.
anya-e0803n12:12_8: Adharā araṇī, adharaṁ bhājana’’miti, yaṁsaddo aniyamattho. Taṁsaddo parammukhāvacano. Etasaddo samīpavacano. Imasaddo accantasamīpavacano. Amusaddo dūravacano. Kiṁsaddo pucchanattho. Ekasaddo saṅkhādivacano. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0803n12:13_1: Tathā hesa ‘‘sassato attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññanti, ittheke abhivadantī’’tiādīsu aññatthe dissati.
anya-e0803n12:13_4: ‘‘Ekova kho bhikkhave khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā’’tiādīsu saṅkhāyanti.
anya-e0803n12:16_0: Sabbo, sabbe. Sabbaṁ, sabbe. Sabbena, sabbehi, sabbebhi.
anya-e0803n12:16_3: Sabbassa, sabbesaṁ, sabbesānaṁ. Sabbasmiṁ, sabbamhi, sabbesu. Bho sabba, bhavanto sabbe.
anya-e0803n12:17_0: Tatra ‘‘sabbo bhūto, sabbe bhūtā’’tiādinā, ‘‘sabbo puriso, sabbe purisā’’tiādinā ca nayena sabbāni pulliṅganāmehi saddhiṁ yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n12:17_1: Yāni pana yamakamahātherena punnapuṁsakavisaye sabba katara katamādīnaṁ aññānipi rūpāni vuttāni. Taṁ yathā?
anya-e0803n12:22_0: Sabbā, sabbā, sabbāyo. Sabbaṁ, sabbā, sabbāyo.
anya-e0803n12:22_1: Sabbāya, sabbassā, sabbāhi, sabbābhi. Sabbāya, sabbassā, sabbāsaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:22_2: Sabbāya, sabbassā, sabbāhi, sabbābhi. Sabbāya, sabbassā, sabbāsaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:22_4: Bhoti sabbe, bhotiyo sabbā, sabbāyo. Itthiliṅgatte nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n12:23_0: Ettha ‘‘sabbā bhāvikā, sabbā bhāvikāyo’’ti, ‘‘sabbā kaññā, sabbā kaññāyo’’ti ca ādinā itthiliṅgasabbanāmāni sabbehi itthiliṅgehi saddhiṁ yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n12:23_1: Ettha ca ‘‘sabbassā’’ti padaṁ tatiyācatutthīpañcamīchaṭṭhīsattamīvasena pañcadhā vibhattaṁ ‘‘tassā kumārikāya saddhi’’nti karaṇappayogādidassanato. Sabbassā kaññāya kataṁ. Sabbassā kaññāya deti.
anya-e0803n12:23_2: Ayaṁ kaññā sabbassā kaññāya hīnā virūpā.
anya-e0803n12:23_3: Ayaṁ kaññā sabbassā kaññāya uttamā abhirūpā.
anya-e0803n12:23_4: Sabbassā kaññāya apeti, sabbassā kaññāya dhanaṁ. Sabbassā kaññāya patiṭṭhitaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:24_0: Sabbaṁ, sabbāni. Sabbaṁ, sabbāni. Sabbena, sabbehi, sabbebhi.
anya-e0803n12:24_3: Sabbassa, sabbesaṁ, sabbesānaṁ. Sabbasmiṁ, sabbamhi, sabbesu. Bho sabba, bhavanto sabbāni.
anya-e0803n12:25_1: Sabbaṁ cittaṁ, sabbāni cittānī’’ti ca ādinā napuṁsakaliṅgasabbanāmāni sabbehi napuṁsakaliṅgehi saddhiṁ yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n12:26_0: Idānissa parapadena saddhiṁ samāso veditabbo ‘‘sabbasādhāraṇo sabbaverī’’iti.
anya-e0803n12:26_2: Sabbesaṁ verī, sabbe vā verino yassa soyaṁ sabbaverīti samāsaviggaho.
anya-e0803n12:26_3: Yathā pana sabbasaddassa padamālā liṅgattayavasena yojitā, evaṁ katarasaddādīnampi adharasaddapariyantānaṁ yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n12:28_1: Kataraṁ…pe… bho katara, bhavanto katare. Katamo, katame. Itaro, itare. Añño, aññe. Aññataro, aññatare. Aññatamo, aññatame. Pubbo, pubbe. Paro, pare. Aparo, apare. Dakkhiṇo, dakkhiṇe. Uttaro, uttare.
anya-e0803n12:28_2: Adharo, adhare…pe… bho adhara, bhavanto adhareti.
anya-e0803n12:30_1: Kataraṁ…pe… bho katara, bhavanto katarāni. Katamaṁ. Ubhayaṁ. Itaraṁ. Aññaṁ. Aññataraṁ. Aññatamaṁ. Pubbaṁ. Paraṁ. Aparaṁ. Dakkhiṇaṁ. Uttaraṁ. Adharaṁ, adharāni.
anya-e0803n12:31_2: Evarūpo nayo aparasabbakatarādīsu aññatamapariyosānesu navasu appasiddho, labbhamāno pubbadakkhiṇuttarādharesu catūsu labbheyya.
anya-e0803n12:31_3: Tathā ‘‘purise’’ti viya pāḷiādīsu ‘‘pubbe’’ti saccasaṅkhepe ‘‘itare’’ti, kaccāyane ca ‘‘pare’’ti sattamīekavacanaṁ dissati.
anya-e0803n12:31_4: Evarūpo nayo sabba aññasaddesu appasiddho, labbhamāno katarakatamādīsu sesesu adharapariyosānesu dvādasasu labbheyya.
anya-e0803n12:31_5: Tathā ‘‘purisā’’ti viya sabbā katarā iccādi pañcamīekavacananayo pāḷiādīsu appasiddho.
anya-e0803n12:31_6: Evaṁ santepi ayaṁ nayo punappunaṁ upaparikkhitvā yutto ce, gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n12:33_1: Kataraṁ…pe… bhoti katare, bhotiyo katarā, katarāyo. Katamā. Ubhayā. Itarā. Aññatarā. Aññatamā. Pubbā. Parā. Aparā. Dakkhiṇā. Uttarā. Adharā, adharā, adharāyo.
anya-e0803n12:33_2: Adharaṁ…pe… bhoti adhare, bhotiyo adharā, adharāyoti.
anya-e0803n12:34_0: Yasmā panetesu itara añña aññatara aññatamānaṁ pāḷiyādīsu ‘‘itarissā’’tiādidassanato koci bhedo vattabbo , tasmā catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṁ ekavacanaṭṭhāne ‘‘itarissā, itarāya, aññissā, aññāya.
anya-e0803n12:34_3: Kassāhaṁ kena hāyāmī’’ti karaṇanissakkappayogadassanato sattamiyā panekavacanaṭṭhāne ‘‘itarissā, itarissaṁ, itarāya, itarāyaṁ, aññissā, aññissaṁ, aññāya, aññāyaṁ, aññatarissā, aññatarissaṁ, aññatarāya, aññatarāyaṁ, aññatamissā, aññatamissaṁ, aññatamāya, aññatamāya’’nti yojetabbaṁ ‘‘aññataro bhikkhu aññatarissā itthiyā paṭibaddhacitto hotī’’ti pāḷidassanato.
anya-e0803n12:35_0: Tatra sabbasaddo sabbasabbaṁ, padesasabbaṁ, āyatanasabbaṁ, sakkāyasabbanti catūsu visayesu diṭṭhappayogo.
anya-e0803n12:35_1: Tathā hesa ‘‘sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchantī’’tiādīsu sabbasabbasmiṁ āgato.
anya-e0803n12:35_3: ‘‘Sabbaṁ vo bhikkhave desessāmi, taṁ suṇātha sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmi…pe… katamañca bhikkhave sabbaṁ cakkhuñceva rūpā ca…pe… mano ceva dhammā cā’’ti ettha āyatanasabbasmiṁ.
anya-e0803n12:35_5: Tattha sabbasabbasmiṁ āgato nippadeso, itaresu tīsu sappadesoti veditabbo. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0803n12:38_0: Katara katamasaddesu katarasaddo appesu ekaṁ vā dve vā tīṇi vā bhiyyo vā appamupādāya vattati.
anya-e0803n12:38_1: Katamasaddo bahūsu ekaṁ vā dve vā tīṇi vā bahuṁ vā upādāya vattati.
anya-e0803n12:38_3: Tatrime payogā ‘‘katarena maggena gantabbaṁ. Samuddo kataro ayaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:38_4: Katamo tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti. Katame dhammā kusalā.
anya-e0803n12:38_5: Disā catasso vidisā catasso, uddhaṁ adho dasa disatā, imāyo, katamaṁ disaṁ tiṭṭhati nāgarājā’’. Iccevamādayo bhavanti. Ubhayo. Ubhayaṁ. Ubhayo. Ubhayena.
anya-e0803n12:38_6: Sesaṁ pulliṅge sabbasaddasamaṁ. Ubhayo janā tiṭṭhanti. Ubhayo jane passati. Yathā ubho puttā. Ubho putteti.
anya-e0803n12:38_7: ‘‘Ubhayo’’ti hi padaṁ ‘‘ubho’’ti padamiva bahuvacanantabhāvena pasiddhaṁ, na tvekavacanantabhāvena. Ettha hi –
anya-e0803n12:41_1: Yadā panāyasmanto ‘‘ubhayo’’ti ekavacanantaṁ passeyyātha, tadā sādhukaṁ manasi karotha.
anya-e0803n12:41_2: Ko hi samattho anantanayapaṭimaṇḍite sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake jinasāsane niravasesato nayaṁ daṭṭhuṁ dassetuñca aññatra āgamādhigamasampannena pabhinnapaṭisambhidena. Idañcetthupalakkhitabbaṁ –
anya-e0803n12:45_0: Idāni asabbanāmesu saṅgaho vuccate – tattha aññasaddo tāva yadā bālavācako, tadā sabbanāmaṁ nāma na hoti.
anya-e0803n12:45_1: Asabbanāmattā ca sabbathāpi purisa kaññā cittanayeneva yojetabbo.
anya-e0803n12:45_2: Tathā hi na jānātīti añño, bālo puriso. Na jānātīti aññā, bālā itthī.
anya-e0803n12:45_3: Na jānātīti aññaṁ, bālaṁ kulanti vacanattho.
anya-e0803n12:45_6: Itthiliṅgaṭṭhāne ‘‘aññā, aññā, aññāyo’’tiādinā kaññānayeneva, napuṁsakaliṅgaṭṭhāne ‘‘aññaṁ, aññānī’’tiādinā cittanayeneva yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n12:46_0: Imasmiñhi atthavisese bālajane vattukāmena ‘‘aññā janā’’ti avatvā ‘‘aññe janā’’ti vutte tassa taṁ vacanaṁ adhippetatthaṁ na sādheti aññathā atthassa gahetabbattā.
anya-e0803n12:46_1: Tathā ‘‘aññānaṁ janāna’’nti avatvā ‘‘aññesaṁ janānaṁ, aññesānaṁ janāna’’nti vā vutte tassa taṁ vacanaṁ adhippetatthaṁ na sādheti.
anya-e0803n12:46_2: Tathā ‘‘aññānaṁ itthīna’’nti avatvā ‘‘aññāsaṁ itthīna’’nti vuttepi, ‘‘aññānaṁ kulāna’’nti avatvā ‘‘aññesaṁ kulānaṁ, aññesānaṁ kulāna’’nti vā vuttepi.
anya-e0803n12:46_3: Sabbanāmikavasena pana adhigatāparavacanicchāyaṁ ‘‘aññe janā’’tiādinā vattabbaṁ, na ‘‘aññā janā’’tiādinā.
anya-e0803n12:46_4: Tathā hi ‘‘aññā janā’’tiādinā vuttavacanaṁ adhippetatthaṁ na sādheti aññathā atthassa gahetabbattā.
anya-e0803n12:46_5: Iti yattha ‘‘aññā janā’’tiādivacanaṁ upapajjati, ‘‘aññe janā’’tiādivacanaṁ nupapajjati, yattha pana ‘‘aññe janā’’tiādivacanaṁ upapajjati, ‘‘aññā janā’’tiādivacanaṁ nupapajjati.
anya-e0803n12:46_6: Yā etasmiṁ atthavisese sallakkhaṇā paññā, ayaṁ nītiyā maggo yuttāyuttivicāraṇe hetuttā, lokasmiñhi yuttāyuttivicāraṇā nītīti vuttā.
anya-e0803n12:46_7: Sā ca vinā paññāya na sijjhati.
anya-e0803n12:47_0: Pubba dakkhiṇuttara parasaddesu pubbasaddo yattha padhānavācako, yattha ca ‘‘semhaṁ pubbo’’tiādīsu lohitakopajavācako, tattha asabbanāmiko.
anya-e0803n12:47_2: Uttamatthavācako pana uttarasaddo ca parasaddo ca asabbanāmiko tiliṅgoyeva.
anya-e0803n12:47_3: Tathā ‘‘dakkhiṇassā vahantima’’nti ettha viya susikkhitatthacaturatthavācako dakkhiṇasaddo.
anya-e0803n12:47_4: ‘‘Petānaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ dajjā’’tiādīsu pana deyyadhammavācako dakkhiṇāsaddo niyogā itthiliṅgo asabbanāmikoyeva.
anya-e0803n12:47_5: Evaṁ añña pubba dakkhiṇuttara parasaddā asabbanāmikāpi santīti tesaṁ sabbanāmesupi asabbanāmesupi saṅgaho veditabbo.
anya-e0803n12:48_0: Idāni katarasaddādīnaṁ parapadena saddhiṁ samāso nīyate ‘‘kataragāmavāsī katamagāmavāsī.
anya-e0803n12:48_1: Ubhayagāmavāsino, itaragāmavāsī aññataragāmavāsī, pubbadisā, parajano, dakkhiṇadisā, uttaradisā, adharapatto’’ti.
anya-e0803n12:48_2: Tatra ‘‘kataro gāmo kataragāmo, katamo gāmo katamagāmo, ubhayo gāmā ubhayagāmā’’tiādinā yathārahaṁ samāsaviggaho, katarasaddassa pana katamasaddena saddhiṁ samāsaṁ icchanti dvidhā ca rūpāni garū ‘‘kataro ca katamo ca katarakatame katarakatamā vā’’ti .
anya-e0803n12:48_3: Tasmā sabbanāmikanayena suddhanāmikesu purisanayena ca katara katamasaddassa nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā, tenassa sampadānasāmivacanaṭṭhānesu ‘‘katarakatamesaṁ, katarakatamesānaṁ, katarakatamāna’’nti tīṇi rūpāni siyuṁ ‘‘katarā ca katamā ca katarakatamā’’ti evaṁ itthiliṅgavasena katasamāse pana sabbanāmikanayena, suddhanāmikesu kaññānayena ca yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n12:48_4: ‘‘Katarañca katamañca katarakatamānī’’ti evaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgavasena katasamāse sabbanāmikanayena, suddhanāmikesu cittanayena ca yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n12:49_0: Ayaṁ panettha visesopi veditabbo – pubbāparādisaddā dvandasamāsādividhiṁ patvā sehi rūpehi rūpavanto na honti, taṁ yathā?
anya-e0803n12:49_1: Pubbāparā, adharuttarā, māsapubbā purisā, diṭṭhapubbā purisā, tathāgataṁ diṭṭhapubbā sāvakā, idaṁ pulliṅgatte paṭhamābahuvacanarūpaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:49_3: Pubbāparānaṁ adharuttarānaṁ, māsapubbānaṁ purisānaṁ, idaṁ pulliṅgatte catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṁ bahuvacanarūpaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:49_4: Ettha saṁ sānamiccete ādesabhūtā na dissanti.
anya-e0803n12:49_5: Tathāgataṁ diṭṭhapubbānaṁ sāvakānaṁ, tathāgataṁ diṭṭhapubbānaṁ sāvikānaṁ, kulānaṁ vā, idaṁ tiliṅgatte catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṁ bahuvacanarūpaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:49_6: Etthāpi saṁ sānamiccete ādesabhūtā na dissanti.
anya-e0803n12:49_7: Māsapubbāyaṁ māsapubbāya, piyapubbāyaṁ piyapubbāya, idamitthiliṅgatte sattamīcatutthīchaṭṭhīnaṁ ekavacanarūpaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:49_9: Māsapubbānaṁ itthīnaṁ, piyapubbānaṁ itthīnaṁ, idamitthiliṅgatte catutthīchaṭṭhībahuvacanarūpaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:49_11: Aññānipi yathāsambhavaṁ yojetabbāni, pubbāparādīnaṁ samāsaviggahaṁ samāsaparicchede pakāsessāma.
anya-e0803n12:51_0: Yo, ye. Yaṁ, ye. Yena, yehi, yebhi. Yassa, yesaṁ, yesānaṁ. Yasmā, yamhā, yehi, yebhi. Yassa, yesaṁ, yesānaṁ. Yasmiṁ, yamhi, yesu. Idaṁ pulliṅgaṁ. Yaṁ, yāni. Yaṁ, yāni. Yena. Sesaṁ pulliṅgasadisaṁ. Atha vā yaṁ, yāni, yā. Yaṁ, yāni, ye. Yena. Sesaṁ pulliṅgasadisaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:51_2: Atha vā pana nikārassa ākārekārādesāpi gāthāvisaye.
anya-e0803n12:53_0: Nimittāni padissanti, tāni ajja padissare’’ti ca,
anya-e0803n12:54_0: ‘‘Kiṁ māṇavassa ratanāni atthi, ye taṁ jinanto hare akkhadhutto’’ti ca idamettha pāḷinidassanaṁ. Idaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:55_0: Yā, yā, yāyo. Yaṁ, yā, yāyo. Yāya, yāhi, yābhi. Yāya, yassā, yāsaṁ. Yāya, yāhi, yābhi. Yāya, yassā, yāsaṁ. Yassaṁ, yāyaṁ, yāsu. Itthiliṅgaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:56_0: Ettha pana yanti saddassa atthuddhāro vuccate – yanti saddo ‘‘yaṁ me bhante devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ sammukhā sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ, ārocemi taṁ bhante bhagavato’’tiādīsu paccattavacane dissati.
anya-e0803n12:56_1: ‘‘Yantaṁ apucchimha akittayī no, aññaṁ taṁ pucchāma tadiṅgha brūhī’’tiādīsu upayogavacane.
anya-e0803n12:56_2: ‘‘Aṭṭhā nametaṁ bhikkhave anavakāso, yaṁ ekissā lokadhātuyā’’tiādīsu karaṇavacane.
anya-e0803n12:56_3: ‘‘Yaṁ vipassī bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho loke udapādī’’tiādīsu bhummavacane dissati. Etthedaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0803n12:57_0: ‘‘Paccatte upayoge ca, bhumme ca karaṇepi ca;
anya-e0803n12:59_0: Parapadena saddhiṁ yaṁsaddassa samāsopi veditabbo ‘‘yaṁkhandhādi, yaṁguṇā, yagguṇā’’ti.
anya-e0803n12:59_1: Tattha yo khandhādi yaṁkhandhādi, ye guṇā yaṁguṇāti samāsaviggaho.
anya-e0803n12:59_2: Tathā hi visuddhimagge ‘‘yaṁguṇanemittikañcetaṁ nāmaṁ, tesaṁ guṇānaṁ pakāsanatthaṁ imaṁ gāthaṁ vadantī’’ti etasmiṁ pade ‘‘ye guṇā yaṁguṇā, yaṁguṇā eva nimittaṁ yaṁguṇanimittaṁ, tato jātaṁ ‘bhagavā’ti idaṁ nāmanti yaṁguṇanemittika’’nti nibbacanamicchitabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:59_3: Yagguṇāti ettha pana ‘‘yassa guṇā yagguṇā’’ti nibbacanaṁ. Tathā hi –
anya-e0803n12:61_0: Atha kā tassa vijaññā, taṁ buddhaṁ bhūguṇaṁ name’’ti
anya-e0803n12:64_0: Niggahītāgamo vātha, dvibhāvo vā siyā dvidhā.
anya-e0803n12:67_0: So, te. Naṁ, taṁ, ne, te.
anya-e0803n12:67_1: Nena, tena, nehi, tehi, nebhi, tebhi.
anya-e0803n12:67_3: Asmā, nasmā, tasmā, namhā, tamhā, nehi, tehi, nebhi, tebhi.
anya-e0803n12:67_5: Asmiṁ, nasmiṁ, tasmiṁ, amhi, namhi, tamhi, tyamhi, nesu, tesu. Idaṁ pulliṅgaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:67_6: Ettha ca āsaṁsaddassa atthibhāve ‘‘nevāsaṁ kesā dissanti, hatthapādā ca jālino’’ti gāthā nidassanaṁ, so ca tiliṅgo daṭṭhabbo. Tyamhīti padassa atthibhāve –
anya-e0803n12:69_0: Atha vissāsate tyamhi, guyhañcassa na rakkhatī’’ti
anya-e0803n12:70_1: Ayamettha rūpaviseso sallakkhitabbo – ariyavinayeti vā sappurisavinayeti vā.

anya-e0803n12:244_8: Yasmā pana paresamanukampāya ayaṁ niyamo, tasmā karuṇāyevāyaṁparādho, na aṭṭhakathācariyānaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:244_9: Tāya eva hi tehi evaṁ saṁvaṇṇanā katāti.
anya-e0803n12:245_0: Keci panettha evaṁ vadeyyuṁ – nanu ca bho aṭṭhakathācariyehi saddanayaṁ nissāya te mesaddānaṁ sāmiatthe vattamānānaṁ ‘‘tava mamā’’ti atthavacanena ‘‘tuyhaṁ maṁsena medena, na mayhaṁ bhariyā esā’’tiādīsu sāmivisayesu vibhattivipallāsanayo dassitoti sakkā vattuṁ, tathā saddanayaññeva nissāya te mesaddānaṁ sampadānatthe vattamānānaṁ ‘‘tuyhaṁ mayha’’nti atthavacanena ‘‘bhattaṁ tava na ruccati.
anya-e0803n12:245_1: Pabbajjā mama ruccatī’’tiādīsupi sampadānavisayesu vibhattivipallāsanayo dassitoti sakkā vattunti?
anya-e0803n12:245_2: Na sakkā, gāthāsu viya cuṇṇiyapadaṭṭhānepi tuyhaṁ mayhaṁ tava mamasaddānaṁ aniyamena dvīsu atthesu pavattanato.
anya-e0803n12:245_3: Na hi īdise ṭhāne gāthāyaṁ vā cuṇṇiyapadaṭṭhāne vā vibhattivipallāso icchitabbo. ‘‘Tassa rajjassahaṁ bhīto.
anya-e0803n12:245_4: Kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmī’’tiādīsuyeva pana ṭhānesu icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n12:246_0: Yadi saddanayaṁ nissāya ‘‘tuyhaṁ maṁsena medenā’’tiādīsu vibhattivipallāso icchitabbo siyā, ‘‘brāhmaṇassa piyaputtadānaṁ adāsi.
anya-e0803n12:246_1: Brāhmaṇassa pitā adāsī’’tiādīsupi saddanayaṁ nissāya ‘‘brāhmaṇāyā’’tiādinā vibhattivipallāsattho vacanīyo siyā catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpānaṁ satthe visuṁ vacanato. Evañca sati ko dosoti ce?
anya-e0803n12:246_2: Attheva doso, yasmā dānayoge vā namoyoge vā āyādesasahitāni catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane nupalabbhanti, tasmā ‘‘brāhmaṇāyā’’tiādinā vibhattivipallāsatthavacane ayaṁ doso yadidaṁ avijjamānaggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:246_3: Yasmā pana īdisesu ṭhānesu vibhattivipallāsakaraṇaṁ sāvajjaṁ, tasmā ‘‘tuyhaṁ maṁsena medenā’’tiādīsupi vibhattivipallāso na icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n12:247_0: Catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni hi anaññāni dissanti ‘‘purisassa adāsi, purisassa dhanaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ adāsi, brāhmaṇānaṁ santaka’’nti.
anya-e0803n12:247_1: Tathā hi pāvacane sa naṁsaddā sampadānasāmiatthesu sāmaññena pavattanti, tappavatti ‘‘aggassa dātā medhāvī’’tiādīhi payogehi dīpetabbā.
anya-e0803n12:247_2: ‘‘Aggassa dātā medhāvī’’ti ettha hi ‘‘aggassā’’ti ayaṁ saddo yadā kriyāpaṭiggahaṇaṁ paṭicca sampadānatthe pavattati, tadā ‘‘aggassa ratanattayassa dātā’’ti atthavasena pavattati.
anya-e0803n12:247_3: Yadā pana kriyaṁ paṭicca kammabhūte sāmiatthe pavattati, tadā ‘‘aggassa deyyadhammassa dātā’’ti atthavasena pavattati.
anya-e0803n12:247_4: Evaṁ sabbathāpi vipallāso tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ na hotīti.
anya-e0803n12:247_5: Tathā saddanayaṁ nissāya ‘‘sampadānavacana’’nti tumhehi daḷhaṁ gahitassa mayhaṁsaddassa sāmiatthavasena paṇṇattiyaṁ dassanato vibhattivipallāso tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ na hoteva. Tathā hi –
anya-e0803n12:250_1: So hi loluppacāritāya ‘‘idampi mayhaṁ, idampi mayha’’nti kāyati ravatīti mayhakoti vuccati mayhasaddūpapadassa ke re ge saddeti dhātussa vasena.
anya-e0803n12:251_0: Atrāyaṁ padasodhanā – yadi tuyhaṁ mayhaṁsaddā dhuvaṁ sampadānatthe, tava mamasaddā ca sāmiatthe bhaveyyuṁ, evaṁ sante lokavohārakusalena sabbaññunā tassa sakuṇassa ‘‘mayhako’’ti paṇṇatti na vattabbā siyā anantogadhasampadānatthattā, antogadhasāmyatthattā pana ‘‘mamako’’ icceva paññatti vattabbā siyā.
anya-e0803n12:252_0: Apicettha mayhaṁsaddo sarūpato vibhatyantabhāvena tiṭṭhati kasaddena ekapadattūpagamanato, evaṁ santepi ‘‘mayhako’’ti ayaṁ sakuṇavisesavācako saddo paccattavacanabhāve ṭhitoyeva īsakaṁ sāmiatthampi jotayati sujampati rājapurisasaddā viya.
anya-e0803n12:252_1: Imināpi kāraṇena vibhattivipallāso tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0803n12:252_2: Iti ‘‘mayhako’’ti paṇṇattiyaṁ vattamānassa padāvayavabhūtassa mayhasaddassa avipallāsavacanalesena tuyhaṁ tava mamasaddesupi vibhattivipallāso na icchitabboti siddhaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:252_3: Tasmā aṭṭhakathācariyehi sampadānasāmiatthesu sāmaññena pavattānampi samānānaṁ tuyhaṁ mayhaṁ tava mamasaddānaṁ saddanayaññeva nissāya paresamanukampāya vuttappakāro niyamo dassitoti avagantabbaṁ. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0803n12:255_0: Evaṁ santepi etesaṁ, niyamo natthi pāḷiyaṁ;
anya-e0803n12:256_0: Koci tesaṁ viseso ca, diṭṭho amhehi taṁ suṇa.
anya-e0803n12:258_0: ‘‘Tuyhaṁ mayha’’ntime saddā, te payogā na dullabhā.
anya-e0803n12:260_0: Sampadāne yahiṁ honti, te payogā panappakā.
anya-e0803n12:263_0: Sabbāpi imā nītiyo paramasukhumā sududdasā vīrajātinā sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0803n12:264_1: ‘‘Kacci vo anuruddhā samaggā sammodamānā’’tiādīsu hi paccatte dissati.
anya-e0803n12:264_6: ‘‘Ye hi voariyā parisuddhā kāyakammantā’’tiādīsu padapūraṇamatte. Etthetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0803n12:268_1: Ayañhi ‘‘gāmaṁ no gaccheyyāmā’’ti ettha paccatte dissati.
anya-e0803n12:268_2: ‘‘Mā no ajja vikantiṁsu, rañño sūdā mahānase’’tiādīsu upayoge.
anya-e0803n12:268_3: ‘‘Na no vivāho nāgehi, katapubbo kudācana’’ntiādīsu karaṇe.
anya-e0803n12:268_6: ‘‘Na no samaṁ atthi tathāgatenā’’ti ettha avadhāraṇe.
anya-e0803n12:268_7: ‘‘Abhijānāsi no tvaṁ mahārājā’’tiādīsu nusaddatthe, pucchāyantipi vattuṁ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0803n12:268_8: ‘‘Subhāsitaññeva bhāseyya, no ca dubbhāsitaṁ bhaṇe’’tiādīsu paṭisedhe.
anya-e0803n12:268_9: ‘‘Na no sabhāyaṁ na karonti kiñcī’’tiādīsu nipātamatte. Etthetaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0803n12:272_0: Idāni sabbanāmānaṁ yathārahaṁ saṁkhittena missakapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n12:273_0: Yo so, ye te. Yaṁ taṁ, ye te. Yena tena. Sesaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ. Yā sā, yā tā. Yaṁ taṁ, yā tā. Yāya tāya. Sesaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ. Yaṁ taṁ, yāni tāni. Sesaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:274_0: ‘‘Eso so, ete te. Ayaṁ so, ime te.
anya-e0803n12:274_1: So ayaṁ te ime’’tiādinā yathāpayogaṁ padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n12:274_2: Tathā hi ‘‘yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako.
anya-e0803n12:274_3: Ete te bhikkhave ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā.
anya-e0803n12:274_4: Ayaṁ so sārathi etī’’ti evamādayo vicittappayogā dissanti.
anya-e0803n12:281_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
